title: Fresh Air Remembers Pioneering Documentary Filmmaker Albert Maysles
teaser: Maysles and his late brother David made the 1976 film Grey Gardens, a study of Jacqueline Kennedy Onassis' relatives who lived in squalor in their decaying mansion. He died last week at age of 88.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
